comments_since_last_sample.body: Tales of vesperia. I owned it on the 360, got it as a Japanese exclusive for the ps3, and again on ps4, Xbox one and steam when the PS3 version got ported.
Take a wild fucking guess. Skyrim of course.
Dark Souls Remastered. Bought it for the switch, ps5 and played the original one xbox 360.
Why buying it multiple time when you can just buy it once and continue playing it ?
Ugh I have had Skyrim on 360, ps3, ps4, psvr, and switch. And I’ve never even beaten it 🙄🙄
Metro 2033 and Last light, have them on Xbox360, Ps4 and Nintendo Switch
Skyrim, Saints Row the Third.
My kids have Minecraft on a dozen different devices.
I bought Suikoden a second time after foolishly selling the first at a garage sale.
Burnout Paradise. Purchased on 360, PS3, PC. and then all over again with the remaster, had so much fun with that in the day

Hmm there have been a few games I have rebought on Switch / Vita just to have them handheld, but these are the ones I have bought more than two times, in order of purchase:

Skyrim - PC, XBox 360, Switch

GTA 5 - XBox 360, PS4, PC

Dynasty Warriors 8 - PC, Vita, Switch

Borderlands 2 - PC, Vita, Switch
Uncharted series. I had 1 through 3 but got the remasters also.

- Pokémon Silver (my favorite one, fight me)
- Castlevania (Aria of sorrow and Symphony)
- Majora's Mask
- Link's Awakening
- Monster Hunter Freedom Unite
- Tron 2.0
- Commander Keen

Just realized that I've purchased a lot of Gameboy games lol

Also I've bought Seafall (legacy board game) for myself no less than 3 times 😆
Okami
Dark souls, majoras mask, resident evil 4.
Bloons TD6, i needed that shit on my pc and phone. Thank god for cross progression
I can't actualy think of a game I've ever bought more than once.
Monster Hunter World

Rome: Total War.

God I love that game.

Think I bought 2 sets of disks in the day when they could get lost or break, bought on Steam and bought the Remaster.
OoT. FF10.
Dragon’s Dogma wasn’t THAT good, but something about its intriguing dark atmosphere romanced me into buying it on every console, including PC and the remasters for the XboxOne and PS4.
Bioshock. 360, xbox one remastered, pc
DayZ. Honestly. I want it on Switch, I could play fine on Xbox, I just have to get past Nintendo graphical disruption.
Dragon's dogma
Stardew Valley. I own the game on Steam, GoG and on the Nintendo Switch
Cod MW2 because that one hit me more in the feels then 1 and 3 did
NFS Most Wanted(2005) and Underground 1&2(2003)
Rocket League. I stopped playing when they sold out and started promoting garbage like the Ford Raptor.
